description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Road Wheels Tender Announcement
## Overview
The Department of National Defence is releasing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of road wheels. This solicitation is for the delivery of 80 wheel assemblies with specific technical and logistical requirements.

## Tender Details
* Tender Number: W8486-238912
* Solicitation Publication Date: October 25, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 19, 2022
* Tender Status: Expired
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Minimum Requirements
* Item 1: Wheel Assembly (GSIN: N2530, NSN: 2530-21-921-7412)
	+ Quantity: 80
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) Montreal, Quebec
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must provide the brand name and model, Part Number, and NSCM/CAGE.

## Amendments
* An amendment has been issued to extend the tender closing date to December 19, 2022.
* Additionally, another amendment was made to note the absence of technical data and drawings for the specific part number. Annex C is to be disregarded.

## Procedure and Documents
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders are required to provide all relevant documents and information as stated in the RFP.
* Contact Information:
	+ Gibbons, Joshua
	+ Email: Joshua.Gibbons@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: Not Available
* A detailed list of required documents and attachments can be found on the Canada Buys website.

## Important Notes
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The tender description, including the RFP and amendments, can be found on the Canada Buys website.
